Name: The Boy Who Typed Wolf
About the game: Explore a real unsolved mystery dating back to antiquity. The Boy Who Typed Wolf is a point & click adventure game filled with unique puzzles, intriguing clues and dark secrets, all based on real events and mythology. Can you solve this enigma? Explore the secrets of a dark Ancient conundrum. A carefully handcrafted story full of scattered pieces of a much greater enigma based on real historical events and mythology. All puzzles are designed to be interesting, unique and are based on exploration and observation of clues and hints. The shadows hide more than meets the eye, secret rooms and puzzles provide additional layers of challenge and replayability.
